column5: AAOI nah dont mess with options Just buy the stock outright and make a recovery with gain in H2
AAOI in past two ERs both Lin and Murray hint at more success in H2 2019

AAOI a different kind of option if youre bullish on this Sell the dec 750 puts for a buck something and buy the 10 calls for a bit more than a buck and change aka a cash secured bull reversalIf the stock goes below 750 youll get put it but your break even is about 640 maybe Hey Id rather buy this at 640 than near 9 If the stock rips past 10 you have a whopping maybe 20 per 100 share cost basis net and you can make an absolute fortune if it rips to 10 or 20 by then Way better idea than just buying here at retail price hoping it goes up If youre bullish this is more of a no brainer than just buying it You can always buy the 5 put if you dont have the margin or dont want to tie up more of your working capital

AAOI never buy a stock in a downtrend Never average down a losing trade Know where your exit is BEFORE you enter and keep max risk at 12 of trading account balance per trade Wait for trend reversal signals higher highs and lower lows pivots before entering a trade in opposite direction of the trend These are all lessons I learned the hard way that Ive tried to share I want retail traders to win and this game is already rigged as it is Huge losses here were avoidable I nearly blew up an account in 2000 knowing a stock was too cheap or way oversold If your stop gets hit let it go you can always get back in on a better setup
